DESCRIPTION:
It took 3 months after the events of the original game.
Having taken part in suppressing the uprising of the Order of the Flaming Rose and defending the king from an assassin, in the second part of the game Geralt is in the heart of the political maelstrom of the kingdom Temeria. He begins his own investigation, trying to understand who and what killed the rulers of the Northern Kingdoms and why killers are so similar to warlocks. The investigation will lead to the upper reaches of the river Geralt Pontar, the troubled land on the border between Temerov, Kaedvenom and Aedirnom. It was in that forest edge will face the most powerful force in the world. Looking for help Witcher different characters - like old friends (Buttercup, Triss, Zoltan), and new acquaintances. Also, when traveling, Geralt begins to remember details of his past. It is not known how newly acquired memory can affect the action of The Witcher. And where some people have gone out of his memories?
